definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
Bikini atoll, French nuclear test site in South Pacific

sentences.english: Today they said, go and put on your bikini for your interview.
sentences.chinese: 今天，他們就說，去穿比基尼接受採訪吧。

sentences.english: High quality photo gallery of hot Japanese Girls in bikini.
sentences.chinese: 高品質的照片庫熱的日本女孩在比基尼。

sentences.english: Wearing a bikini, Sara tries to get Scuderi to take her to his suite.
sentences.chinese: 莎拉穿着比基尼，勾引史古德利，試圖進入他的套房。

sentences.english: On board each of the Sunseeker boats, a model in a black bikini poses on the deck.
sentences.chinese: 每艘甲板上都有一位身穿黑色比基尼的模特搖弋生姿。

sentences.english: The most popular pantie silhouette in women's underwear is the bikini panty.
sentences.chinese: 在女性內衣中，最受歡迎的可能要數比基尼了。

sentences.english: And maybe monokini, which I have a fashion preference for.
sentences.chinese: 或許還有露胸比基尼，正是我偏愛的。

sentences.english: Aki Hoshino is a Japanese bikini idol.
sentences.chinese: 星野亞希是一個日本比基尼偶像。

sentences.english: Many old people find the bikini immodest.
sentences.chinese: 許多老年人感到穿比基尼式游泳服不正派。

sentences.english: The show has also had its contestants walk in a public square wearing bikinis.
sentences.chinese: 該節目還曾讓選手們身穿比基尼在廣場走來走去。

sentences.english: The same can not be said of the "bikini" bottom.
sentences.chinese: 下身穿的，同樣不能說它就是的“比基尼”。

sentences.english: She's just appeared on the cover of Vogue Hommes Japan wearing a meat bikini.
sentences.chinese: 她最近以一身鮮肉比基尼造型亮相日本時尚雜誌封面。

sentences.english: The young woman in the bikini?
sentences.chinese: 穿比基尼那個年輕女人。

sentences.english: But what do you mean, "a meat bikini"?
sentences.chinese: 可是你說的“鮮肉比基尼”是什麼意思呢？

sentences.english: And it is not just the bikini industry that is suffering.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在巴西並不只是比基尼產業正水深火熱。

sentences.english: Nina looks absolutely outstanding in a sexy blue bikini.
sentences.chinese: 尼娜穿着三點式比基尼看起來絕對最突出的一個。

definition: old feminine garment, covering chest and abdomen
(of a woman) to have nice curves/buxom/shapely
